tool.name: AWS Transcribe
tool.description: Transcribe speech to text via AWS Transcribe
tool.command: sh transcribe.sh input_file s3_bucket_directory output_file galaxy_base_directory audio_format

param.name: s3_bucket_directory
param.label: S3 Bucket Name / Directory
param.help: S3 bucket name and directory path

param.name: galaxy_root_directory
param.label: Galaxy Root Directory
param.help: Root directory where Galaxy is installed

param.name: audio_format
param.label: Audio Format
param.help: Format of the audio file. For best results use a lossless format such as FLAC or WAV with PCM 16-bit encoding.

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
Transcribe speech audio input to text output using Amazon Transcribe Web Service.
